name: Christopher Allen
description: Lead author of the free [Learning Bitcoin from the Command Line](https://github.com/BlockchainCommons/Learning-Bitcoin-from-the-Command-Line), the free [#SmartCustody](https://www.smartcustody.com/2019-09-17-Blockchain-Commons-Releases-First-SmartCustody-Book/) book on protecting your digital assets, and the SSL/TLS and Decentralized Identifier (DID) international standards. Executive Director/Principal Architect of [Blockchain Commons](https://www.BlockchainCommons.com) and maintainer of many open source and blockchain infrastucture projects.
